```{r}
data(TempBrazil)
```

```{r}
library(Ipaper)

df = fread("inst/extdata/anusplin_demo/RH_01-01.dat") %>%
  set_names(c("site","lon", "lat", "alt", "RH"))

f_dem = "inst/extdata/anusplin_demo/china_dem_025deg.txt"
range <- c(70, 140, 15, 55)
# range <- c(-78, -34, -36, 5)
p = anusplin_params(df, "ChinaHI", f_dem, range, res = 1, 
  alt = "cov")
# alt: 协变量
str(p)

```
